title: Exploring Eigenvector Solutions for Linear Differential Equations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary differential equations, basic matrix operations, and foundational vector geometry
context.additional_context: A language education vocational course for preservice/in-service teachers utilizing digital device-based learning environments

learning_goals: Explain the principles of eigenvector solutions for linear differential equation systems through predictive-investigative-mathematization-generalization activities.
Predicting eigenvector directions and deriving corresponding exponential function solutions in a second-order linear ordinary differential equation system
Generalizing the general solution structure of a system by combining numerical predictions with algebraic verification
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
